entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
